name: Concession Oils Popper's Choice
description: Concession Oils Popper's Choice is a premium liquid fat and oil specifically designed for popcorn applications. This versatile ingredient is ideal for enhancing the flavor and texture of popcorn, making it the perfect choice for popcorn manufacturers and enthusiasts. Popper's Choice is a kosher-certified and SQF Certified product, ensuring the highest standards of quality and safety. It is made with a blend of soybean oil and coconut oil, providing a delicious buttery flavor that popcorn lovers crave. With the addition of natural and artificial flavors, Popper's Choice delivers a mouthwatering taste experience. This allergen-free, GMO-free, and cholesterol-free ingredient complies with the regulations of the Food Allergen Labeling and Consumer Protection Act (FALCPA).

Certifications & Compliance: The Food Allergen Labeling & Consumer Protection Act of 2004 (FALCPA)
